text: Lianyungang Huaguoshan International Airport is an airport scheduled to be built to serve the port city of Lianyungang in Jiangsu, China. Once completed it will become Lianyungang's main airport, with the existing dual-use Lianyungang Baitabu Airport becoming a dedicated military air base. Huaguoshan Airport will be located in Xiaoyi Township, Guanyun County, about from the city center. It is named after Mount Huaguo (Huaguoshan), a major tourist attraction in Lianyungang. The airport will have a runway that is long and wide (class 4D). It is projected to handle 2.5 million passengers and 20,000 tons of cargo after completion. ==See also== *List of airports in China *List of the busiest airports in China ==References== Category:Airports in Jiangsu Category:Proposed airports in China Category:Lianyungang
title: Lianyungang Huaguoshan International Airport
